item.description:
Chunky's Cinema Pub in Nashua is showing the Final Episode of Lost on the BIG SCREEN on May 23! The fate of Oceanic 815 will be coming to an end and all your questions will finally be answered. It's the most important episode!!

The screening is FREE and they're accepting reservations for parties of 8+ as long as everyone is ordering food and beverage from the menu. Deadline for RSVP is Thursday, May 19 at 10:00AM. All "maybe" rsvps will be changed to "no" at the Deadline, as the theater is confirming counts that day. Please change your RSVP to "No" if your plans change after the deadline so that I can notify the theater.

Doors open at 6:30PM for the 7:00PM airing of the recap followed by the Finale at 9:00PM. Please plan to arrive between 6:30 and 7:15. Seats are not guaranteed after 7:30! Reservation is under "Melissa Gleaton/Nerd Fun"

Please bring CASH ONLY to contribute towards the group's food and beverage bill!

About Chunky's: First, you are seated at a table in one of the spacious cinemas. Your leather chair is the driver or passenger seat from a Limousine and will have one armrest, recline, and is on wheels. Next, check out their diverse menu. Your waiter or waitress will be around to take your order so you don't have to miss any of the good parts! Quench that thirst and grab a bite to eat. Chunky's menu selections currently include beer and wine, (21 and over only) soft drinks, and a variety of pub-style food selections. Get there early and enjoy your meal before the movie starts. You may also order throughout the movie. Click here for the menu and to learn more about Chunky's
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation under my name, and I'll have Meetup table signs
item.name: LOST finale on the big screen
